subject: Data
title: Interactive Dashboards: Data You Can Explore
description: A 60-second lesson on Interactive Dashboards: Data You Can Explore.

hook.text: A CEO clicks a sales chart, drills into a region, filters by product, and finds a problem in seconds.

buildup.text: Interactive dashboards let users filter, zoom, and explore data instead of reading static reports.

discovery.text: Tools like Tableau and Power BI made interactive visualization accessible without coding.

twist.text: Interactivity can overwhelm. Too many filters and buttons lead to 'dashboard fatigue' â€” nobody explores.

climax.text: The best dashboards answer the first question immediately and let curious users dig deeper.

punchline.text: A great dashboard answers before you ask.

quiz.question: What makes interactive dashboards effective?
options: Answering key questions immediately with optional depth
